attributes.action: GMO UK Wide ban and GMO Technology ban, GMO has been known to cause cancers and insect population reduction.
attributes.additional_details: GMO UK Wide ban and GMO Technology ban, GMO has been known to cause cancers in rats and it has been seen that GMO also causes cancers in wildlife who eat the GMO crops, GMO also causes reduction in insect populations infect other crops and has reduced nutritional value in the human food chain. We the people want to see an outright ban on GMO following the example of EU countries who have already banned it and destroyed GMO crops.
